mainText.attr1: Unlike Ship mode - Tactical mode is intended to function (almost entirely) via the mouse. Left click to select an object, right click to issue an order, and zoom via the mouse wheel. The interface is nearly entirely represented via buttons and controls - versus hidden elements of ship mode.

Because Tactical Mode is at its essence a 3D map - giving you a battle awareness - moving around it is very important. This is accomplished via WASD - and QE keys (by default). As well as holding down the right mouse button and then moving the camera to change the camera's orientation.
Keyboard is intended to be used for a few key functions or as a short cuts.
Just like in Ship Mode - controls in Tactical Mode are mappable.
